text: Aṉṟiyum ātu(k kūṭṭattār) pūmiyil aniyāyamākap perumaiyaṭittuk koṇṭu, "eṅkaḷai viṭa valimaiyil mikkavarkaḷ yār?" Eṉṟu kūṟiṉārkaḷ - avarkaḷaip paṭaitta allāh niccayamāka avarkaḷai viṭa valimaiyil mikkavaṉ eṉpatai avarkaḷ kavaṉittirukka villaiyā? Iṉṉum avarkaḷ nam attāṭcikaḷai maṟuttavāṟē iruntārkaḷ
